name: Which Side Of Heaven? Persuasive game prototype
name_original: Which Side Of Heaven? Persuasive game prototype
description:
Here is my persuasive game prototype for GAME355. it will be fixed and updated shortly, However I apologize for any buggy enemy movements or not filled in texts yet. They will be well on their way for the final version. Regardless, I hope you enjoy and can put up with any funkiness that might end up your way!

Controls: Arrow keys to move (up,down,left,right) and Click the left mouse button to shoot your Reaper scythes'.

Objective: Avoid Enemies , read the texts available, destroy all other beings, and learn where and which side of heaven you truly stand.

*FULLSCREEN HIGHLY RECOMMENDED*
